verses.text: Follow \w after|strong="G1377"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w desire|strong="G2206"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \add gifts\add*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* in \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* man \w understandeth|strong="G0191"\w* \add him\add*; \w howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* he \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* \w mysteries|strong="G3466"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w prophesieth|strong="G4395"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \add to\add* \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3889"\w*.

He \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* in \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w edifieth|strong="G3618"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w prophesieth|strong="G4395"\w* \w edifieth|strong="G3618"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* that \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w prophesied|strong="G4395"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w greater|strong="G3187"\w* \add is\add* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w prophesieth|strong="G4395"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w except|strong="G1622"\w* he \w interpret|strong="G1329"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* may \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3570"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall I \w profit|strong="G5623"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* I shall \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w either|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w prophesying|strong="G4394"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*?

And \w even|strong="G3676"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* without \w life|strong="G0895"\w* \w giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w sound|strong="G5456"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w pipe|strong="G0836"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w harp|strong="G2788"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* they \w give|strong="G1325"\w* a \w distinction|strong="G1293"\w* in the \w sounds|strong="G5353"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall it be \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* is \w piped|strong="G0832"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w harped|strong="G2789"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* an \w uncertain|strong="G0082"\w* \w sound|strong="G5456"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* shall prepare \w himself|strong="G3903"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w battle|strong="G4171"\w*?

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* ye \w utter|strong="G1325"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w easy|strong="G2154"\w* to \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w understood|strong="G2154"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall it be \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* is \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* ye shall \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w air|strong="G0109"\w*.

There \w are|strong="G2076"\w*, it \w may|strong="G1487"\w* \w be|strong="G5177"\w*, so \w many|strong="G5118"\w* \w kinds|strong="G1085"\w* of \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add is\add* without \w signification|strong="G0880"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w meaning|strong="G1411"\w* of the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, I shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* unto \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* a \w barbarian|strong="G0915"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w barbarian|strong="G0915"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*, forasmuch \w as|strong="G1893"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2207"\w* of \w spiritual|strong="G4151"\w* \add gifts\add*, \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w excel|strong="G4052"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1355"\w* let \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* in \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w interpret|strong="G1329"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* I \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* in \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w prayeth|strong="G4336"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? I will \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* with the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* with the \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: I will \w sing|strong="G5567"\w* with the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w sing|strong="G5567"\w* with the \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Else|strong="G1893"\w* \w when|strong="G1437"\w* thou shalt \w bless|strong="G2127"\w* with the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G0378"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w occupieth|strong="G0378"\w* the \w room|strong="G5117"\w* of the \w unlearned|strong="G2399"\w* \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w thy|strong="G4674"\w* giving of \w thanks|strong="G2169"\w*, \w seeing|strong="G1894"\w* he \w understandeth|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* thou \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* givest \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w is|strong="G3618"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w edified|strong="G3618"\w*.

I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* more \w than|strong="G3123"\w* \w ye|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*:

\w Yet|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* I had \w rather|strong="G2309"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \add by my voice\add* I might \w teach|strong="G2727"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w* ten \w thousand|strong="G3463"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w children|strong="G3813"\w* in \w understanding|strong="G5424"\w*: \w howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* in \w malice|strong="G2549"\w* be ye \w children|strong="G3515"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* in \w understanding|strong="G5424"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w men|strong="G5046"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w With|strong="G1722"\w* \add men of\add* other \w tongues|strong="G2084"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w* will I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* yet for all \w that|strong="G3779"\w* will \w they|strong="G1522"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w hear|strong="G1522"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* a \w sign|strong="G4592"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that believe \w not|strong="G0571"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w prophesying|strong="G4394"\w* \add serveth\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* for \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that believe \w not|strong="G0571"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* for \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* be come \w together|strong="G4905"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* one \w place|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* there come \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \add those that are\add* \w unlearned|strong="G2399"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*, will \w they|strong="G2046"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye are \w mad|strong="G3105"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* there come \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* that believeth \w not|strong="G0571"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add one\add* \w unlearned|strong="G2399"\w*, he is \w convinced|strong="G1651"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, he is \w judged|strong="G0350"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w are|strong="G1096"\w* the \w secrets|strong="G2927"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* falling \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \add his\add* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* he will \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, and \w report|strong="G0518"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* of a \w truth|strong="G3689"\w*.

\w How|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*? \w when|strong="G3752"\w* ye come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w psalm|strong="G5568"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w*, \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* an \w interpretation|strong="G2058"\w*. \w Let|strong="G1096"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* be \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1535"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w an|strong="G1100"\w* \add unknown\add* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \add let it be\add* \w by|strong="G0303"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* at the \w most|strong="G4118"\w* \add by\add* \w three|strong="G5140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* by \w course|strong="G3313"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1329"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w interpret|strong="G1329"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* there \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w interpreter|strong="G1328"\w*, let him keep \w silence|strong="G4601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* let him \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1161"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1252"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w judge|strong="G1252"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \add any thing\add* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* to \w another|strong="G0243"\w* that sitteth \w by|strong="G2521"\w*, \w let|strong="G4601"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* hold his \w peace|strong="G4601"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w may|strong="G1410"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* may \w learn|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* may be \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* are \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* to the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add the author\add* of \w confusion|strong="G0181"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

Let \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* keep \w silence|strong="G4601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2010"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w permitted|strong="G2010"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add they are commanded\add* to be under \w obedience|strong="G5293"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, let them \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w their|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w home|strong="G3624"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w shame|strong="G0150"\w* for \w women|strong="G1135"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w What|strong="G2228"\w*? \w came|strong="G1831"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* came \w it|strong="G2658"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* think \w himself|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*, let him \w acknowledge|strong="G1921"\w* that the \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* be \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*, let him be \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w covet|strong="G2206"\w* to \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forbid|strong="G2967"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*.
Let all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* be \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w decently|strong="G2156"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w order|strong="G5010"\w*.
